nodes.bodyText: It appears to get set to false and then never changed
Ah! I see. Setting it in the if condition is interesting...
Yeah, I'm not sure if it's a convention we are comfortable with.

I myself don't care for the assignment in the if statement.  In my opinion the if statement should just be checking a boolean condition not also assigning the value to the variable that it ultimately checks.  I would assign it beforehand and then check if the variable is true then find the existing item.
I agree with Paulo, like James I missed it the first time I was reviewing and missed where it was getting set because I'm not used to seeing those get set as part of a conditional
